```{r set up}
library(pacman)
p_load(tidyverse, haven, knitr, psych, stats4, stargazer,
       magrittr, qwraps2, Jmisc)

# get directory of current file
current_directory <- 
  dirname(dirname(rstudioapi::getSourceEditorContext()$path))

# read in data
mydata <- read_dta(file.path(current_directory, "data",
                             "pset2_2024.dta"))

```
